alert.note: Alert for Lee; Magoffin; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 11:43PM EDT until July 28 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT THURSDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN POWELL, NORTHEASTERN LEE, NORTHWESTERN MAGOFFIN, SOUTHWESTERN MORGAN AND WOLFE COUNTIES... At 1143 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported flash flooding in several locations in Wolfe and Magoffin counties. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Campton, Lewis, Fincastle, Landsaw, Trent, Lexie, Malaga, Hazel Green, Baptist, Stillwater, Lower Gilmore, Gilmore, Toliver, Daysboro, Upper Gilmore, Gosneyville, Murphyfork, Helechawa, Rexville and Hollonville. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
